English: I have a regular menstrual cycle.
I want children. I want to be a mother.
Being a mother isn't for me.
I don't want children yet anyway.
hungarian: Én legalábbis még nem akarok gyereket.

Finnish: Nyt ei ole hyvä hetki yrittää lasta.
English: Now is not a good time to try for a baby.
hungarian: Most nem alkalmas arra, hogy babát próbáljak.

English: Am I too old to be a mother?
hungarian: Túl öreg vagyok ahhoz, hogy anya legyek?

English: I became pregnant on the first try.
I'm pregnant! We're going to be parents.
There will be three of us soon.

Finnish: Olemme yrittäneet lasta puolen vuoden ajan.
English: We've been trying for a baby for half a year.

Finnish: Minua surettaa, etten voi saada lapsia.
English: I'm sad that I can't have children.
The egg detaches from the ovary.
The sperm penetrates the surface layer of the egg.
hungarian: A spermium áthatol a tojás felszíni rétegén.

English: The fertilized egg passes into the uterus.
hungarian: A megtermékenyített petesejt a méhbe utazik.

English: The egg attaches to the lining of the uterus.
hungarian: A tojás a méh nyálkahártyájához tapad.

English: I'm pregnant. I'm going to be a mother.
I immediately knew I was pregnant.
I'm trying to keep my pregnancy a secret.
The due date is in January.
I'm in my 23rd week of pregnancy.

Finnish: Olen nyt ollut raskaana kaksi kuukautta.
English: I've currently been pregnant for two months.
She's at the end of her pregnancy.

Finnish: Olin kauhuissani, kun tajusin olevani raskaana.
English: I was horrified when I realized I was pregnant.
hungarian: Megrémültem, amikor rájöttem, hogy terhes vagyok.

Finnish: Millainen raskaus on ollut tähän asti?
English: What's the pregnancy been like so far?
What kind of pregnancy symptoms do you have?
My breasts / boobs are really sensitive.
I have to pee all the time.
I'm scared something will happen to the baby.
hungarian: Félek, hogy valami történik a babával.

English: I crave pickles all the time.
My pregnancy has been very tough.
I vomited hundreds of times during my pregnancy.
hungarian: Több százszor hánytam a terhességem alatt.

English: The nausea has been incredibly shocking.

Finnish: Alussa minulla oli todella paha olo.
English: At the beginning I felt really bad.
I was hospitalized in the 18th week of pregnancy.
hungarian: A terhesség 18. hetében kellett kórházba kerülni.

English: My pregnancy has been easy physically.
My pregnancy has been difficult mentally.
Does the baby get enough oxygen?
I'm worried about the baby's well-being.
Everything is looking well in the scan.
I gained 20 kg during my pregnancy.
Do you want to know your child's gender in advance?
Do you know what gender your baby is?
Are you having a girl or a boy?

Finnish: En halua tietää lapsen sukupuolta etukäteen.
English: I don't want to know the baby's gender in advance.
hungarian: Nem akarom előre tudni a gyerek nemét.

Finnish: En halua tietää, kumpi sieltä tulee.
English: I don't want to know which gender is coming.
hungarian: Nem akarom tudni, melyik jön onnan.

Finnish: Tiedän vauvan sukupuolen, mutta en paljasta sitä.
English: I know the sex of the baby, but I won't reveal it.
hungarian: Tudom a baba nemét, de nem árulom el.

Finnish: Olen varma, että sieltä tulee tyttö.
English: I'm sure it will be a girl.
hungarian: Biztos vagyok benne, hogy lesz lány.

English: Have you already thought about names?
In my country, the name is chosen before birth.
hungarian: Hazámban a nevet születés előtt választják.

English: We haven't decided the names yet.

Finnish: Haluan ensin nähdä, miltä vauva näyttää.
English: I first want to see what the baby looks like.
hungarian: Először látni akarom, hogy néz ki a baba.

Finnish: Nimi oli valmiina jo alusta asti.
English: The name has been ready since the beginning already.
hungarian: A név kezdettől fogva készen volt.

English: We're looking forward to the baby so much.
The baby already turned to the delivery position.
hungarian: A baba már szülési pozícióba fordult.

Finnish: Vauva on jo kääntynyt pää alaspäin.
English: The baby has already turned head down.
My son's birth weight was normal.
hungarian: A fiam születési súlya normális volt.

English: The baby was born legs first.
I gave birth in the hospital.
The midwife helped with the birth.
My husband was present at the delivery.
hungarian: A férjem jelen volt a szülésnél.

English: My first-born was born at midnight.
The girl was born by caesarean section.
My previous pregnancy ended in a section.
hungarian: Az előző terhességem C-metszéssel ért véget

English: The baby is still high in the birth canal.
hungarian: A baba még mindig magasan van a szülőcsatornában.

Finnish: Minusta tuntuu, että minulla on supistuksia.
English: I feel like I'm having contractions.
My contractions started an hour ago.
The contractions last about a minute at a time.
hungarian: Az összehúzódások egyszerre körülbelül egy percig tartanak.

Finnish: Minulla on supistukset viiden minuutin välein.
English: I have contractions every five minutes.
One contraction lasts for a minute.
I was given an epidural anesthetic.

hungarian: Itt az ideje, hogy erőfeszítéseket tegyünk.

English: My husband came to the operating room with me.
hungarian: A férjem jött velem a műtőbe.

English: The father cut the umbilical cord.
Our baby was born a month early.
hungarian: Egy hónappal korábban megszületett a babánk.

English: The baby boy was born during week 40 + 3.
hungarian: A kisfiú a terhesség 40. + 3. hetében született.
A terhesség 34 + 6 hetében a magzatvíz leállt.

English: I lost over 5 liters of blood during delivery.
hungarian: Több mint 5 liter vért vesztettem a szülés során.

Finnish: Vauvani oli syntyessään 2652 g ja 48 cm.
English: My baby was 2652 grams an 48 cm when born.
hungarian: A babám születéskor 2652 g és 48 cm volt.

Finnish: Tyttöni oli syntyessään 2,6 kg ja 45 cm.
English: My daughter was 2,6 kilos and 45 cm when born.
hungarian: A lányom 2,6 kg és 45 cm volt, amikor megszületett.

English: My baby was blue when he / she was born.
There were complications during the delivery.

Finnish: Meidän poikamme saapui maailmaan viikko sitten!
English: Our son came into the world a week ago!
hungarian: Egy hete érkezett a világra a fiunk!

Finnish: Meille syntyi pikkuinen poikavauva viime yönä!
English: We had a little baby boy last night!
We had a baby girl last night!

Finnish: Meille syntyi pieni tyttövauva yöllä kello 00.17.
English: We had a little baby girl at 00.17 am.

Finnish: Meille syntyi tänään terve pikku poika
English: We had a healthy little boy today.
A little girl was born to our family yesterday.
hungarian: Tegnap egy kislány született a családunkban.

English: A beautiful little girl was born to our family yesterday.
hungarian: Tegnap egy gyönyörű kislány született a családunkban.

English: The whole family is doing well!
We are the happiest in the world!
hungarian: Mi vagyunk a legboldogabbak a világon!

Finnish: Koko perhe on hyvin onnellinen vauvan tulosta.
English: The whole family is very happy with the baby's arrival.
hungarian: Az egész család nagyon elégedett a babával.

Finnish: Poika päätti tulla yli kuukauden etuajassa.
English: The boy decided to come more than a month early.
hungarian: A fiú úgy döntött, több mint egy hónappal korábban jön.

English: Wonderful! Congratulations to the whole family!
Happy pregnancy for the whole family!
Congratulations to the baby and the whole family!
hungarian: Gratulálunk a babának és az egész családnak!

Congratulations on the birth of the tiny princess!
